content.json:
# Microsoft Exchange Admin Activity

This workbook helps you visualize what is happening in your Exchange environment.
Results removed :
	- All Test-* and Set-AdServerSetting Cmdlets

parameters.name: EnvironmentList
parameters.label: Environment
parameters.query:
ExchangeAdminAuditLogs | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
 | summarize by ESIEnvironment

content.json:
This tab parses the events from Admin Audit logs :

- list of cmdlets
- filter on a VIP and/or Sensitive objects (based on Watchlist "Exchange VIP" and " Monitored Exchange Cmdlets")
- anomalies detections are based on the KQL function series_decompose_anomalies

parameters.name: CallerFilter1
parameters.label: Caller
parameters.query:
ExchangeAdminAuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Status == "Success"
| distinct Caller

parameters.name: CmdletFilter1
parameters.query:
let ExcludedCmdlet = externaldata (Cmdlet:string)[h"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nlepagnez/ESI-PublicContent/main/Operations/Watchlists/ExcludedCmdletWatchlist.csv"]with(format="csv",ignoreFirstRecord=true)| project Cmdlet;
ExchangeAdminAuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Status == "Success"
| where CmdletName  !in (ExcludedCmdlet)
| distinct CmdletName

content.json:
This section show all the Cmdlets executed in the selected time range. Possible filters are: 
- **VIP Only selected** Cmdlets used against VIP objects (based on the "Exchange VIP" watchlist)
- **Sensitive Cmdlets** Cmdlets considered as Sensitive (based on the "Monitored Exchange Cmdlets" watchlist)

These informations can be useful to detect unexpected behaviors or to determine what are the action performed by the accounts (ie. service accounts).

‚ÑπÔ∏è It is recommended to delegated only the necessary privileges to an account.

content.query:
let ExcludedCmdlet = externaldata (Cmdlet:string)[h"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nlepagnez/ESI-PublicContent/main/Operations/Watchlists/ExcludedCmdletWatchlist.csv"]with(format="csv",ignoreFirstRecord=true)| project Cmdlet;
ExchangeAdminAuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Status == "Success"
//| where TargetObject !contains "Health"
| where CmdletName  !in (ExcludedCmdlet)
| where IsVIP in ({VIPOnly})
| where IsSensitive in ({SensitiveOnly})
| summarize count() by CmdletName
| sort by count_
content.title: List of all executed cmdlets during the last 90 days (based on Sentinel retention)

content.query:
let ExcludedCmdlet = externaldata (Cmdlet:string)[h"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nlepagnez/ESI-PublicContent/main/Operations/Watchlists/ExcludedCmdletWatchlist.csv"]with(format="csv",ignoreFirstRecord=true)| project Cmdlet;
ExchangeAdminAuditLogs
 | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Status == "Success"
//| where TargetObject !contains "Health"
| where CmdletName  !in (ExcludedCmdlet)
| where IsVIP in ({VIPOnly})
| where IsSensitive in ({SensitiveOnly})
| summarize count() by CmdletName
| join kind=leftouter ( ExchangeAdminAuditLogs 
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
    | where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
    | where Status == "Success"
    //| where TargetObject !contains "Health"
    | where CmdletName  !in (ExcludedCmdlet)
    | where IsVIP in ({VIPOnly})
    | where IsSensitive in ({SensitiveOnly})
    | make-series Count=count() on TimeGenerated from ago(30d) to now() step 1d by CmdletName
    | extend Anomalies=series_decompose_anomalies(Count)
) on CmdletName
| project CmdletName, Total=count_, Count, Anomalies
| sort by Total

let ExcludedCmdlet = externaldata (Cmdlet:string)[h"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nlepagnez/ESI-PublicContent/main/Operations/Watchlists/ExcludedCmdletWatchlist.csv"]with(format="csv",ignoreFirstRecord=true)| project Cmdlet;
ExchangeAdminAuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Status == "Success"
//| where TargetObject !contains "Health"
| where CmdletName  !in (ExcludedCmdlet)
| where IsVIP in ({VIPOnly})
| where IsSensitive in ({SensitiveOnly})
| summarize Total = count() by Caller
| join kind=leftouter ( ExchangeAdminAuditLogs 
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
    | where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
    | where Status == "Success"
    | where IsVIP in ({VIPOnly})
    | where IsSensitive in ({SensitiveOnly})
    | make-series Count=count() on TimeGenerated from ago(30d) to now() step 1d by Caller
    | extend Anomalies=series_decompose_anomalies(Count)
) on Caller
| project Caller, Total, Count, Anomalies
| sort by Total desc

content.json:
## List of Cmdlets
You can pick a tile in the list of all executed cmdlets above to filter the list.

By default all accounts found in the log are displayed.

Select an account in the previous section, to display on Cmdlets launched by this user

> **Legend**    
>    
> üëë VIP user    
> üí• Sensitive action

If needed, select an item in the dropdownlist. Dropdownlist are independent.

parameters.name: CallerFilter
parameters.label: Caller
parameters.query:
let ExcludedCmdlet = externaldata (Cmdlet:string)[h"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nlepagnez/ESI-PublicContent/main/Operations/Watchlists/ExcludedCmdletWatchlist.csv"]with(format="csv",ignoreFirstRecord=true)| project Cmdlet;
ExchangeAdminAuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Status == "Success"
| where CmdletName  !in (ExcludedCmdlet)
| where IsVIP in ({VIPOnly})
| where IsSensitive in ({SensitiveOnly})
| distinct Caller
| sort by Caller asc

parameters.name: TargetObjectFilter
parameters.label: Target Object
parameters.query:
let ExcludedCmdlet = externaldata (Cmdlet:string)[h"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nlepagnez/ESI-PublicContent/main/Operations/Watchlists/ExcludedCmdletWatchlist.csv"]with(format="csv",ignoreFirstRecord=true)| project Cmdlet;
ExchangeAdminAuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Status == "Success"
| where CmdletName  !in (ExcludedCmdlet)
| where IsVIP in ({VIPOnly})
| where IsSensitive in ({SensitiveOnly})
| distinct TargetObject
| sort by TargetObject asc

parameters.name: CmdletFilter
parameters.label: Cmdlet Filter
parameters.query:
let ExcludedCmdlet = externaldata (Cmdlet:string)[h"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nlepagnez/ESI-PublicContent/main/Operations/Watchlists/ExcludedCmdletWatchlist.csv"]with(format="csv",ignoreFirstRecord=true)| project Cmdlet;
ExchangeAdminAuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Status == "Success"
| where CmdletName  !in (ExcludedCmdlet)
| where IsVIP in ({VIPOnly})
| where IsSensitive in ({SensitiveOnly})
| distinct CmdletName
| sort by CmdletName asc

content.title: History

content.json:
## VIP modifications

This view allows you to quickly see what is happening on VIP accounts.
**This tab needs Option 2 or 3**

This section displays the modifications on VIP Active Directory objects for the selected Time Range.

It is based on the security events 4725, 4726, 4738, 4740 and 4767.

content.query:
let ImportantADActivities = dynamic([4725,4726,4738,4740,4767]);
let Env = ExchangeConfiguration(SpecificSectionList="ESIEnvironment")
| extend DomainFQDN_ = tostring(CmdletResultValue.DomainFQDN)
| project DomainFQDN_, ESIEnvironment;
let VIPUsers = _GetWatchlist('ExchangeVIP') | summarize make_list(tostring(sAMAccountName)) ;
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where EventID in (ImportantADActivities)
| extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
| extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where SubjectUserName in (VIPUsers) or TargetUserName in (VIPUsers)
| extend Activity = split(Activity,"- ")[1]
| extend SubjectUserName = iif( SubjectUserName in (VIPUsers), strcat(SubjectUserName, " üëë"), SubjectUserName)
| extend SubjectUserName = iif( SubjectUserName hassuffix "$", strcat("üíª ", SubjectUserName), strcat("üë®‚Äçüíº ", SubjectUserName))
| extend TargetUserName = iif( TargetUserName in (VIPUsers), strcat(TargetUserName, " üëë"), TargetUserName)
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, SubjectUserName,TargetUserName
| order by TimeGenerated desc

content.json:
This tab parses the events from the System and Security event logs of the Exchange servers. You can use it for the following activities:

- Track the Exchange services status (based on the event 7036 and on the watchlist "Exchange Services Monitoring")
- Track logons on the servers (this excludes network logons)
- Track creations, modifications and delegation actions of local user accounts

content.title: Security Events per Exchange Servers

content.query:
let Env = ExchangeConfiguration(SpecificSectionList="ESIEnvironment")
| extend DomainFQDN_ = tostring(CmdletResultValue.DomainFQDN)
| project DomainFQDN_, ESIEnvironment;
let ExchangeServices = _GetWatchlist('ExchangeServicesMonitoring') | summarize make_list(DisplayName);
Event 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where EventID == 7036
| extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
| extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Computer like "{ComputerFilter}"
| where WindowsService_CF in (ExchangeServices)
| extend ServiceNewState_CF = iif( ServiceNewState_CF == "stopped", strcat("üî¥ ",ServiceNewState_CF), strcat("üü¢ ",ServiceNewState_CF))
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, WindowsService_CF, ServiceNewState_CF
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

content.json:
Details of logon on the Exchange servers (or the selected server from the tiles above).

This parses the security event 4624 on Exchange servers.

This uses the following filters:
- LogonType <> 3 (Network)
- AccountType <> "Machine"
- TargetUserName !hasprefix "HealthMailbox"
- Account !hasprefix "Window Manager"

content.query:
let Env = ExchangeConfiguration(SpecificSectionList="ESIEnvironment")
| extend DomainFQDN_ = tostring(CmdletResultValue.DomainFQDN)
| project DomainFQDN_, ESIEnvironment;
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
| extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Computer like "{ComputerFilter}"
| where EventID == 4624
| where LogonType <> 3
| where AccountType <> "Machine" 
| where TargetUserName !hasprefix "HealthMailbox"
| where Account !hasprefix "Window Manager"
| summarize count() by LogonTypeName
content.title: Logon Type statistics

content.query:
let Env = ExchangeConfiguration(SpecificSectionList="ESIEnvironment")
| extend DomainFQDN_ = tostring(CmdletResultValue.DomainFQDN)
| project DomainFQDN_, ESIEnvironment;
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
| extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Computer like "{ComputerFilter}"
| where EventID == 4624
| where LogonType <> 3
| where AccountType <> "Machine" 
| where TargetUserName !hasprefix "HealthMailbox"
| where Account !hasprefix "Window Manager"
| project TimeGenerated, Computer,  Account, IpAddress, LogonTypeName
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

content.json:
Details of local account activities on the Exchange servers (or the selected server from the tiles above). It parses the following security events:
- 4720 Account creation
- 4724 Password reset
- 4722 Account enabled
- 4725 Account disabled
- 4726 Account deleted

content.query:
let Env = ExchangeConfiguration(SpecificSectionList="ESIEnvironment")
| extend DomainFQDN_ = tostring(CmdletResultValue.DomainFQDN)
| project DomainFQDN_, ESIEnvironment;
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
| extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Computer like "{ComputerFilter}"
| where EventID in (4720,4724,4722,4725,4726)
| extend Action = case(EventID == 4720, "üÜï Account creation", EventID == 4724, "üîÑ Password reset", EventID == 4722, "üü¢ Account enabled", EventID == 4725, "üî¥ Account disabled","‚ùå Account deleted")
| summarize count() by Action
content.title: List of local account activities

content.query:
let Env = ExchangeConfiguration(SpecificSectionList="ESIEnvironment")
| extend DomainFQDN_ = tostring(CmdletResultValue.DomainFQDN)
| project DomainFQDN_, ESIEnvironment;
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
| extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| where Computer like "{ComputerFilter}"
| where EventID in (4720,4724,4722,4725,4726)
| extend Action = case(EventID == 4720, "üÜï Account creation", EventID == 4724, "üîÑ Password reset", EventID == 4722, "üü¢ Account enabled", EventID == 4725, "üî¥ Account disabled","‚ùå Account deleted")
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Action, SubjectAccount, TargetAccount

content.json: This is an experimental tab to search for information from the Message Tracking logs.

content.query:
MessageTracking
| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
| summarize Max = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| extend Age = strcat( datetime_diff( "Hour", now(), Max) , " hours ago")
content.noDataMessage: No message tracking data for more than 7 days

content.query:
MessageTracking
| search "*{Filter}"
| project-away $table
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

content.json:
This tabs show the data ingestions of logs used to monitor Exchange Servers activities.

Note that the Event table contains all Windows event log events but the security event logs.

content.query:
let Env = ExchangeConfiguration(SpecificSectionList="ESIEnvironment")
| extend DomainFQDN_ = tostring(CmdletResultValue.DomainFQDN)
| project DomainFQDN_, ESIEnvironment;
Event 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
| extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| summarize Total=count() by Computer
| join (Event
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
    | extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
    | extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
    | where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
    | make-series EventCount=count() on TimeGenerated from ago(90d) to now() step 1d by Computer
    | extend EventAnomalies=series_decompose_anomalies(EventCount)
) on Computer
| extend Computer = strcat("üíª ", Computer)
| project-away TimeGenerated, Computer1
| sort by Total desc
content.title: Event table

content.query:
let Env = ExchangeConfiguration(SpecificSectionList="ESIEnvironment")
| extend DomainFQDN_ = tostring(CmdletResultValue.DomainFQDN)
| project DomainFQDN_, ESIEnvironment;
W3CIISLog 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
| extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| summarize Total=count() by Computer
| join (W3CIISLog
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
    | extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
    | extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
    | where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
    | make-series EventCount=count() on TimeGenerated from ago(90d) to now() step 1d by Computer
    | extend EventAnomalies=series_decompose_anomalies(EventCount)
) on Computer
| extend Computer = strcat("üíª ", Computer)
| project-away TimeGenerated, Computer1
| sort by Total desc
content.title: W3CIISLog table

content.query:
let Env = ExchangeConfiguration(SpecificSectionList="ESIEnvironment")
| extend DomainFQDN_ = tostring(CmdletResultValue.DomainFQDN)
| project DomainFQDN_, ESIEnvironment;
SecurityEvent 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
| extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| summarize Total=count() by Computer
| join (SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
    | extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
    | extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
    | where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
    | make-series EventCount=count() on TimeGenerated from ago(90d) to now() step 1d by Computer
    | extend EventAnomalies=series_decompose_anomalies(EventCount)
) on Computer
| extend Computer = strcat("üíª ", Computer)
| project-away TimeGenerated, Computer1
| sort by Total desc
content.title: SecurityEvent table

content.query:
let EHP = union isfuzzy=true withsource=TableName ExchangeHttpProxy, blabla*, Event | where TableName != "Event";
let Env = ExchangeConfiguration(SpecificSectionList="ESIEnvironment")
| extend DomainFQDN_ = tostring(CmdletResultValue.DomainFQDN)
| project DomainFQDN_, ESIEnvironment;
EHP 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
| extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
| where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
| summarize Total=count() by Computer
| join (EHP
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
    | extend DomainEnv = replace_string(Computer,strcat(tostring(split(Computer,'.',0)[0]),'.'),'')
    | join kind=leftouter  ( 
        Env
    ) on $left.DomainEnv == $right.DomainFQDN_
    | extend ESIEnvironment = iif (isnotempty(ESIEnvironment), ESIEnvironment, strcat("Unknown-",DomainEnv))
    | where ESIEnvironment in ('{EnvironmentList}')
    | make-series EventCount=count() on TimeGenerated from ago(90d) to now() step 1d by Computer
    | extend EventAnomalies=series_decompose_anomalies(EventCount)
) on Computer
| extend Computer = strcat("üíª ", Computer)
| project-away TimeGenerated, Computer1
| sort by Total desc
content.title: ExchangeHttpProxy table
